QuestData.Title: Return to the Ruby Lifeshrine
QuestData.Description:
And this is just the beginning of your dragonriding journey!
Keep your eyes open for new adventures and experiences throughout the Dragon Isles, and be sure to visit us in any of our outposts.
For now, return to Alexstrasza to continue your exploration in these lands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Alexstrasza at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome back.
There is much more to do here, but know that you do not take to the skies alone.

Objectives.Objective: Ride Relastrasza to the Skytop launch tower
